name: PixelJunk Shooter 2
description:
Download PixelJunk™ Shooter 2 today! Pilot an interplanetary rescue ship to save the workers trapped deep within alien environments. Explore diverse environments or dive into online battle and fight through the league, unlocking new weapons and abilities along the way. If you are going to survive you must navigate the dynamic terrain to safely rescue survivors scattered about the cavernous environment. But beware! Enemies and elements are fighting against you every step of the way! Can you make it out alive?
Download the full game today!
